name: GetTrelloMemberInfo
description:
Fetch information about a Trello member profile.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a specific Trello member by their ID. This is useful for accessing profile details of users within Trello.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member to retrieve information for.

value_schema.description: The ID or username of the member

parameters.name: include_actions
parameters.description: Include actions related to the member. Refer to the Actions Nested Resource for details.

value_schema.description: See the [Actions Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#actions-nested-resource)

parameters.name: include_boards_details
parameters.description: Specify if you want to include detailed information about the member's boards. Refer to the Boards Nested Resource for options.

value_schema.description: See the [Boards Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#boards-nested-resource)

parameters.name: board_backgrounds_option
parameters.description: Specify type of board backgrounds: `all`, `custom`, `default`, `none`, or `premium`.

value_schema.description: One of: `all`, `custom`, `default`, `none`, `premium`

parameters.name: include_boards_invited
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of board states like closed, members, open, etc., to filter invited boards.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of: closed, members, open, organization, pinned, public, starred, unpinned

parameters.name: invited_boards_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of board fields for invited boards. Options include: id, name, desc, and more.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of board [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_card_details
parameters.description: Include detailed information about cards associated with the member. Refer to the Cards Nested Resource for options.

value_schema.description: See the [Cards Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#cards-nested-resource) for additional options

parameters.name: include_custom_board_backgrounds
parameters.description: Specify whether to include custom board backgrounds. Use `all` for all backgrounds or `none` to exclude them.

value_schema.description: `all` or `none`

parameters.name: include_custom_emoji
parameters.description: Specify whether to include all custom emojis ('all') or none ('none') in the response.

value_schema.description: `all` or `none`

parameters.name: include_custom_stickers
parameters.description: Specify if custom stickers should be included. Use `all` to include or `none` to exclude.

value_schema.description: `all` or `none`

parameters.name: member_fields_selection
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of member fields to retrieve information about. Use 'all' to retrieve all available member fields.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of member [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: notification_details
parameters.description: Fetch notification information related to the member. Refer to the Notifications Nested Resource for options.

value_schema.description: See the [Notifications Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#notifications-nested-resource)

parameters.name: organization_visibility
parameters.description: Specify organization visibility: `all`, `members`, `none`, or `public`.

value_schema.description: One of: `all`, `members`, `none`, `public`

parameters.name: organization_fields_selection
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of organization fields like 'id', 'name'.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of organization [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_invited_organizations
parameters.description: Specify the scope of invited organizations to include: all, members, none, or public.

value_schema.description: One of: `all`, `members`, `none`, `public`

parameters.name: organization_fields_to_include
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of organization fields like 'id', 'name' to include in the response.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of organization [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_tokens
parameters.description: Include tokens associated with the member. Options: `all` to include, `none` to exclude.

value_schema.description: `all` or `none`

parameters.name: return_board_stars
parameters.description: Set to true to return boardStars in the response, otherwise false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Whether to return the boardStars or not

parameters.name: include_paid_account_information_in_workspace
parameters.description: Include paid account information in the returned workspace object if true.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned workspace object

parameters.name: include_paid_account_information
parameters.description: Include paid account information in the returned member object when true.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned member object

parameters.name: include_saved_searches
parameters.description: Set to true to include saved searches information in the response, false to exclude.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.
